primevc.core.net.ICommunicator

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
Interface to describe objects that communicate with another resource and are able to give status updates about it.

Instance Variables

bytes(getBytes,setBytes) : haxe.io.BytesData

bytesProgress(getBytesProgress,null) : Int

Total bytes loaded/send for all processes together

bytesTotal(getBytesTotal,null) : Int

Total number of bytes to load/send for all processes together

events(default,null) : primevc.core.events.LoaderSignals

isStarted(default,null) : Bool

Flag indicating wether the process is started

length(default,null) : primevc.core.Bindable_Int

Indicates the number of process going on within the communicator

type(default,null) : CommunicationType

Instance Methods

close() : Void

Method will stop all communications

isCompleted() : Bool

Flag indicating wether the process is completed (true when a COMPLETE event is fired or when the bytesProgress are equal to the bytesTotal)

isInProgress() : Bool
